block_detective.configuration.title: Block Detective Configuration
block_detective.configuration.block_info: Configure JEI/REI/EMI block info page settings
block_detective.configuration.item_info_: Configure JEI/REI/EMI item info page settings
block_detective.configuration.tooltip_hi: How the hint tooltip should look under the items. TINY = [+], NORMAL = [+] Shift, EXTENDED = Hold Shift for more information
block_detective.configuration.use_ctrl_i: Use [CTRL] instead of [SHIFT] key to show the additional informations
block_detective.configuration.show_regis: Show the registry name in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_destr: Show the destroy time in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_explo: Show the explosion resistance in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_jump_: Show the jump factor in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_light: Show the light level in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_speed: Show the speed factor in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_frict: Show the friction in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_if_fl: Show if the block is flammable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_if_so: Show if the block is solid in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_instr: Show the noteblock instrument in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_map_c: Show the map color of this block in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_if_gr: Show of the block is gravity affected in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_if_re: Show if the block requires the correct tool to drop in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_cl: Show if the block is climbable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_im: Show if the block is impermeable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_re: Show if the block is replaceable (if your place another block on it) in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_an: Show if animals can naturally spawn on the block in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_be: Show if the block is a beacon base block in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_in: Show if the block infinitely burns in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_dampe: Show if the block dampens vibrations in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_pa: Show if the block is pathfindable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_max_s: Show the maximum stack size in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_max_d: Show the maximum damage (~durability) in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_damag: Show the current damage in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_stone: Show the mining speed of stone in the item tooltips (only on tools)
block_detective.configuration.show_dirt_: Show the mining speed of dirt in the item tooltips (only on tools)
block_detective.configuration.show_show_: Show the mining speed of logs in the item tooltips (only on tools)
block_detective.configuration.show_is_en: Show if the item is enchantable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_fo: Show if the item is food in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_dy: Show if the item is dyable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_be: Show if the item is a beacon payment in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_tr: Show if the item is a trim material in the item tooltips
Show if the item is trimmable in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_gr: Show if the item is repairable on the grindstone in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_is_pi: Show if the item is accepted as piglin currency in the item tooltips
block_detective.configuration.show_makes: Show if the item makes piglins neutral in the item tooltips
